publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8124 Bob Doris: Green Light for Subway Modernisation—That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement by the Scottish Government that it is to support Strathclyde Partnership for Transport’s business case for subway modernisation in Glasgow; believes that this reaffirms the SNP government’s strong commitment to investing in Glasgow, which it considers is already demonstrated by its investment in projects such as the 2014 Commonwealth Games, the M74 extension, the new Southern General Hospital and many others; looks forward to the upgrading of Glasgow’s clockwork orange, and congratulates all those who have helped campaign for subway modernisation. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Stewart Maxwell*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-8124 Green Light for Subway Modernisation (lodged on 9 March 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
